tidbits.title: Vast Steppes and Landscapes
tidbits.description: Kazakhstan features vast steppes, deserts, and mountainous landscapes, including the spectacular Tien Shan and Altai Mountains.

tidbits.title: Rich Nomadic Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a rich nomadic heritage, reflected in its traditions, yurts (or felt tents), and a deep respect for equestrian culture.

tidbits.title: Modern Urban Centers
tidbits.description: Kazakhstan boasts modern urban centers like Astana (now Nur-Sultan) and Almaty, blending modernity with cultural heritage and innovation.
